content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -83.0)
-  Furnace at position(42.0, -81.0)
-  Furnace at position(45.0, -80.0)
-  Furnace at position(40.0, -79.0)
### Electricity generator at position(-6.0, 24.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
### Lab at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of lab and nearby chests
### Copper cable factory
No structures found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from chests
-  Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
-  Ensure the entities are close enough to be connected with pipes
-  Ensure the pipe connections are not obstructed by other entities
### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is empty before attempting to place an entity
### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure the boiler has fuel before attempting to produce steam
### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a boiler and has a fluid input before attempting to generate power
